feedbackScreen.feedbackPrompt: Would you like to give feedback on your navigation experience?
feedbackScreen.afterNavigationFeedback: Would you like to tell us, how well did Tipomobi help you to find your destination?
feedbackScreen.normalFeedback: Would you like to give feedback on Tipomobi?
feedbackScreen.submitError: An error occured while processing your feedback. Please try again.

menuScreen.welcomeText: Welcome to Tipotie! Tipomobi-app will help you to find your way to your appointment.

qrCodeScreen.helpText: Find the QR code in the upper part of the received letter

taxiScreen.bookingDescription1: Call to book a taxi by 2 pm the previous day. You should call the regional number also if you need a taxi unexpectedly or forgot to book a taxi on the preceding day.
taxiScreen.bookingDescription2: You will get reimbursed straight away and will only pay up to the amount of the appropriate copayment. Please be aware that if you book a taxi in some other way, Kela will not reimburse you for the trip.
taxiScreen.withDisabilitiesHeader: Customers with a hearing or speech impairment
taxiScreen.disabilitiesDescribtion: The customer's personal information must be provided over the phone before the first ride.

infoScreen.description:
Tipomobi is an indoor guidance based on indoor positioning application that facilitates navigation at the Tipotie Wellness Center.

The application allows you to find the route to the reception waiting rooms and other customer rooms.

feedback.title: Tipomobi feedback
feedback.message: Would you like to give feedback about Tipomobi app?
